Articles.Content: While I accustomed to some jitter with the patched conics, it seems to me that this got way worse in 1.04. The navball seems to be fibrillating, and apoapsis/periapsis is all over the place even when there is 10k distance between them. I had a Minmus intercept that fluctuated 400km. My current Mun interception periapsis is 21-36km. I've been away from the forum for a few weeks, so I don't know if this is a known issue with 1.04 or it's just me.
